title: Drawing, "Design for a Canopy Bed", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
markings: watermark: Strasburg lily, L G im H... (similar, Heawood 1743)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Frame of a canopied tent bed seen in elevation, surmounted by a small dome and cluster of feathers.  Inside and outside views and plan shown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Canopy Bed", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-495.
